catalyst: The text mentions that the reaction of CO2 photoreduction was performed over the sample g-C3N4-0.1/Bi2WO6, referring to it as "the catalyst" and comparing its activity to pure Bi2WO6 and g-C3N4. Therefore, the catalyst used is the g-C3N4/Bi2WO6 composite, specifically the g-C3N4-0.1/Bi2WO6 sample.
